channel.title: Looking for coder or help
channel.description:
[center]Ok, im new to web designe but im quite nifty with PS, what iv got is a template that is 800x1000 and is like a mini VISTA DEKSTOP, its got a window in a sspreate layer, a start bar and task bar each with there own layer and so on... iv gotr afew desktop icons aswell.
What i would like to know is if its possible to make the window MOVEABLE and closeable with the ability to re open it, and maby have the icons link to sumwhere, iv got Screan shots if thay help, there a lil outdated, iv added more stuff sinced thay wer taken.
allso havfe a watermarked PSD is it helps, i would realy be gratefull if sum 1` would be able to help me out with thhis as i know just about nothing about websites ect...
[i]Thankyou for your time and please do reply, it all help :)[/i]
[b]4 H-qual previews PNG.[/b] [URL=http://filebeam.com/72d31adda714b1b94afeccc616d79085]DOWNLOAD[/URL][/center]
